name: Prima: Lost Origin
description:
"Prima" is a RPG made by Hugo Garcia-Cotte. http://www.prima-jdr.fr/ (French website)

Game length is about 1-2 hours for the main quest. Many more for all the collectables!

All in-game texts are only in French for now.

Controls:

  • Left click = Select
  • Right click = Interact / Attack / Move
  • Hold right click = Move continuously
  • Arrows = Move camera
  • Escape = Pause
  • M = Map
  • I = Inventory
  • J = Quests
  • H = Heal
